snippet: The announcement comes a year after the Assad government used sarin gas to kill more than 1,000 people in Damascus.
abstract: United States says it has completed destruction of deadliest chemical weapons in Syria's arsenal, rare foreign policy achievement for Pres Obama at time when Middle East is embroiled in violence and political turmoil.
lead_paragraph: The announcement comes a year after the Assad government used sarin gas to kill more than 1,000 people in Damascus.

headline.main: Syria’s Chemical Arsenal Fully Destroyed, U.S. Says
headline.print_headline: Syria’s Chemical Arsenal Fully Destroyed, U.S. Says

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
